cells.data:
Motion
  • Asynchronous motor control, 4 wheel drive
  • Shifting gears? Can switch to gear 0. 
  • Pressure sensor in board for acceleration and deceleration / interface on waist or belt
  • GPS location system/speed limit regulations

Other 
  • charging port 
  • Housing on bag 

Automation
  • walking alongside you 
  • Navigating to charging port 
  • Navigating to user 
  • Able to receive command from home assistant or voice
  • Satellite images for traffic information
  • Weather information (rain or snow, lower speed than usual and could do that crazy brake thing)
  • Videotape trips and regular backup. Regular recording of speed, position and equipment status. 
  • Sending text if accident occurred. Send tapes.
  • Self report.
